sentences.en: Attendance at the meeting is compulsory.
Attendance at these lectures is not compulsory.
sentences.cn: 这些课不是硬性规定要听的。

sentences.en: Britain did not introduce compulsory primary education until 1880.
sentences.cn: 直到1880年，英国才开始实行初等义务教育。

sentences.en: Certain courses are compulsory, others are optional.
sentences.cn: 某些课程是必修的，其他是选修的。

sentences.en: English, Maths, ICT and science are compulsory subjects.
sentences.cn: 英语、数学、信息与通信技术和科学是必修科目。

sentences.en: He believes that the study of history should be compulsory in school.
sentences.cn: 他认为在学校里学习历史应该是强制性的。

sentences.en: It is compulsory for all motorcyclists to wear helmets.
sentences.cn: 所有骑摩托车的人都必须戴头盔，这是强制性的。

sentences.en: It was settled by compulsory arbitration.
sentences.cn: 此事已通过强制性仲裁得到解决.

sentences.en: Russian is the one compulsory foreign language on the school curriculum.
sentences.cn: 俄语在学校课程设置中是一门必修的外语课。

sentences.en: Some subjects, such as mathematice, physics and English, are compulsory for the students in this department.
sentences.cn: 有些课程, 比如数学 、 物理和英语, 本系学生都是必修的.

sentences.en: They have campaigned strongly for compulsory registration of dogs.
sentences.cn: 他们强烈呼吁实行犬类强制登记。

sentences.en: Unions pledged to fight any compulsory redundancies "tooth and nail".
sentences.cn: 工会许诺会“竭尽所能地”阻止任何强制裁员。

sentences.en: Which subjects are compulsory in your school?
sentences.cn: 在你们学校里,哪些课程是必修的?

words.tran_cn: （花样滑冰、竞技体操等的）规定动作

trans.tran_en: something that is compulsory must be done because it is the law or because someone in authority orders you to

trans.tran_cn: （花样滑冰、竞技体操等的）规定动作
